Skincare tips for the delicate eye area

Don’t wait! Start using eye care in your 20s.

Nourish and hydrate the eye area to help prevent fine lines and wrinkles, and to firm and brighten the skin around your peepers.

Use something active.

You want your skincare to do something right? Try the Mukti Age Defiance Eye Serum, it’s firming, hydrating and brightening, and has proven anti-wrinkle effects.

Don’t use products that are too rich.

The skin around the eyes has fewer oil glands so is more sensitive and delicate. It’s important to choose products specifically designed for the eye area.

Ask your therapist.

Our expert facial therapists are highly trained and passionate about non-toxic skincare and helping you achieve radiant healthy skin. Ask them your eye care questions for tailored skin care advice.

Our must-haves for the eye area

For fine lines and wrinkles – Mukti Age Defiance Eye Serum

For daily nourishment – Sodashi Eye & Lip Smoother
